EmailTemplate.name: 14/11/2013 Philippine Disaster
EmailTemplate.subject: Philippine Disaster
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
British International School Kuala Lumpur Chartered By The British Schools Foundation
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
Please note that majority of donations have been boxed and delivered this morning to the Philippine Embassy. Therefore no need for those parents who plan to come to the school this afternoon (3pm to 4pm was specified in yesterdayâ€™s letter) that is not required.
However some donations are expected this afternoon so if they are here at the school and want to help they can ask if anything needs to be done.
Kind Regards The Event and Fundraising Committee
Administration Team The British International School of Kuala Lumpur World Class Education
__________________________________________________________ Beijing - Kuala Lumpur - Sao Paulo - Manila - Moscow - Guangzhou - Nanjing - Tashkent - Pamplona - Marbella
